archetype_name: Family Heat Lovers: Korean & Latin American Feasts (Hot, 30–60, Advanced)
name: Gochujang Chicken Tinga Tostadas with Habanero-Lime Slaw and Smoky Black Beans
description: Grilled gochujang-marinated chicken gets a Latin tinga-style finish, piled onto crisp tostadas with a fiery lime slaw and smoky black beans. A bold Korean–Latin mashup built from scratch with real heat.
prep_steps: Pat dry 900 g chicken thighs and place in a bowl.
In a small bowl, mix gochujang, soy sauce, honey, 2 minced garlic cloves, and ground cumin to form a marinade.
Thinly slice 1/2 head cabbage and 1 small red onion; place in a large bowl.
Finely slice 2 jalapenos (leave seeds for extra heat).
In a cup, whisk juice of 2 limes, rice vinegar, sugar, and a big pinch of salt; pour over cabbage, red onion, and half the jalapenos. Toss and set aside.
Rinse and drain 1 can black beans.
Chop a small handful of coriander for garnish.
Brush grill grates with olive oil. Preheat OutdoorGrill to medium-high. Set a large skillet on the StoveTop.
cook_steps: Add the marinade to the chicken thighs and coat well. Grill over medium-high heat 5–6 minutes per side until charred and cooked through (juices run clear). Rest 5 minutes, then slice.
While chicken grills, heat 1 tbsp olive oil in the skillet over medium. Add 1 minced garlic clove and the remaining jalapenos; cook 30 seconds.
Stir in black beans, chipotle sauce, a pinch of salt, and 2–3 tbsp water. Simmer 3–4 minutes, mashing lightly with a spoon until thick and spreadable. Keep warm on low.
In a separate wide pan, heat 1 cm of canola oil over medium-high. Fry tortillas one at a time 30–45 seconds per side until golden and crisp. Drain on paper towels and sprinkle with salt.
Return sliced chicken to the grill (or a hot pan) for 30–60 seconds with a spoonful of salsa to glaze lightly.
Assemble tostadas: spread a spoonful of smoky black beans on each crisp tortilla, top with sliced chicken, a mound of habanero-lime slaw, and a drizzle of salsa.
Finish with chopped coriander and black pepper. Serve immediately while tostadas stay crisp.

ingredients.preparation: 1 tbsp for beans, 1 tbsp for grill grates

final_ingredients.preparation: 1 tbsp for beans, 1 tbsp for grill grates
